heroDescription: Decatur, Illinois, is a vibrant city known for its rich history and diverse economy.
landscapeDescription: With a population of 74,710, Decatur serves as a regional hub for agriculture and manufacturing. The economy is bolstered by a mix of industries, including healthcare and education.
uniqueNeeds: Decatur's economy requires a focus on diversifying industries and enhancing workforce skills.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Decatur's reliance on manufacturing poses risks during economic downturns. Real estate may face volatility; consider diversification. Tornadoes and flooding are local weather threats.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Decatur's economy has shown resilience with a growth rate of 2.5% in the last year, driven by manufacturing and healthcare sectors.

sections.title: Business Environment
